name: Notion Student Dashboard
description: Transform Your Student Life with an Organized Notion Dashboard Introducing a pre-built template crafted to help students manage their academic life. Simplify your student life by centralizing your classes, course notes, and assignments, empowering you to excel with ease.Here are some of the features: Course tracking Assignments and exams tracking Note-taking system Upcoming assignment and exam overview Grade calculator Quick sidebar navigation Stay on top of your coursework and never miss a dead
features: Course tracking; Assignments and exams tracking; Note-taking system; Upcoming assignment and exam overview; Grade calculator; Quick sidebar navigation
